alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Grafton; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 4:21PM EST until December 19 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Smith River At Bristol affecting Belknap, Grafton and Merrimack Counties. Pemigewasset River At Plymouth affecting Belknap and Grafton Counties. Pemigewasset River At Woodstock affecting Grafton County. Baker River At Rumney affecting Grafton County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Smith River at Bristol. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:46 PM EST Monday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
